sentence: …These Agencies are on the frontlines protecting our communities from  fentanyl and other opioids. But detection is getting more difficult.  Fentanyl is so potent and moved in quantities so small that high-value  shipments are easily hidden. As a result, law enforcement needs access  to technology and resources to quickly and efficiently detect these  drugs.…
